essence: Interplay of light and darkness through combustion in an enclosed space

primary_constituents.name: Candle
primary_constituents.description: Solid fuel composed of wax and a wick, capable of undergoing exothermic oxidation when ignited

primary_constituents.name: Room
primary_constituents.description: Enclosed space with no ambient electromagnetic radiation in the visible spectrum

primary_constituents.name: Flame
primary_constituents.description: Localized region of sustained exothermic oxidation producing visible electromagnetic radiation

manifestation.essence: Localized excitation of atomic electron shells generating coherent visible light emission

primary_constituents.name: Photons
primary_constituents.description: Discrete packets of visible electromagnetic radiation emitted during atomic excitation

manifestation.essence: Quantized energy carriers oscillating at 400-700 THz frequencies in the visible spectrum

primary_constituents.name: Electron Excitation States
primary_constituents.description: Transient energy levels in hydrogen and carbon atoms during oxidative combustion

primary_constituents.name: Photon Emission Dynamics
primary_constituents.description: Quantum transitions between excited and ground states releasing discrete energy packets

governing_framework: Quantum electrodynamics of atomic energy level transitions
Blackbody radiation spectrum tailoring by molecular composition
Wave-particle duality maintaining coherence in emitted light
driving_forces_and_potential: Thermal excitation driving electron energy state transitions
Quantum tunneling enabling photon emission across energy barriers
Resonance amplification maintaining coherent light emission patterns
manifestation.foundational_state: Atomic electron shells in metastable excited states within the flame's thermal gradient

primary_constituents.name: Remaining Flame Components
primary_constituents.description: Aggregate state of unobserved molecular interactions and thermal gradients

governing_framework: Thermal gradient maintaining plasma state within combustion zone
Oxidative decomposition shaping light emission spectrum
Scattering dynamics governing light propagation through room air
driving_forces_and_potential: Thermodynamic pressure driving continuous fuel oxidation
Radiant energy diffusion through room volume
Quantum coherence maintaining emission spectrum stability
manifestation.foundational_state: Localized plasma state with temperature gradient sustaining atomic excitation

primary_constituents.name: Air
primary_constituents.description: Mixture of gases including diatomic oxygen (O₂) and nitrogen (N₂), with trace noble gases

governing_framework: Conservation of energy through thermal and radiant energy conversion
Chemical reaction between hydrocarbon molecules and diatomic oxygen
Propagation of visible light through scattering in a dark medium
driving_forces_and_potential: Thermal gradient driving heat transfer from combustion to surroundings
Radiant energy diffusion through the room's volume
Gradual consumption of fuel mass through oxidative decomposition
foundational_state: Dark room with lit candle, atmospheric pressure at 101.325 kPa, temperature at 298 K
